hb.util
Class Arguments

java.lang.Object
  |

public class Arguments
extends java.lang.Object

Class comment: Static class that makes it easier to parse command line arguments.

set

public static void set(java.lang.String[] argv)
Method comment: This method must be called before any other.

setExitStatus

public static void setExitStatus(int status)
Method comment: Set exit satus used when System.exit() is called. Default is 1 (one).

indexOf

public static int indexOf(java.lang.String argument)
Method comment: Find position of given parameter. If it does not exist -1 is returned.

getFlag

public static boolean getFlag(java.lang.String flag)
Method comment: Return true if the given parameter is in argument list, otherwise false.

assertFlag

public static void assertFlag(java.lang.String option,
                              java.lang.String errormsg)
Method comment: Assert that the flag exists. Otherwise an error message will be printed and System.exit() will be called.

assertOption

public static void assertOption(java.lang.String option,
                                java.lang.String errormsg)
Method comment: Assert that the option and its following value does exist. Otherwise an error message will be printed and System.exit() will be called.

getOption

public static java.lang.String getOption(java.lang.String option)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a String). If it does not exist an empty string is returned.

getOption

public static java.lang.String getOption(java.lang.String option,
                                         java.lang.String errormsg)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a String). If it does not exist an errormsg will be printed and the program will exits with an System.exit()-call.

getOptionAsInt

public static int getOptionAsInt(java.lang.String option)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a int). If it does not exist Integer.MIN_VALUE is returned.

getOptionAsInt

public static int getOptionAsInt(java.lang.String option,
                                 java.lang.String errormsg)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a int). If it does not exist or is a non-integer an errormsg will be printed and the program will exits with an System.exit()-call.

getOptionAsInt

public static int getOptionAsInt(java.lang.String option,
                                 int defaultValue)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a int). If it does not exist or is a non-integer an errormsg will be printed and the program will exits with an System.exit()-call.

getOptionAsDouble

public static double getOptionAsDouble(java.lang.String option)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a double). If it does not exist Double.MIN_VALUE is returned.

getOptionAsDouble

public static double getOptionAsDouble(java.lang.String option,
                                       java.lang.String errormsg)
Method comment: Get value following option (as a double). If it does not exist or is a non-double an errormsg will be printed and the program will exits with an System.exit()-call.

getLastOption

public static java.lang.String getLastOption()
Method comment: Return the last argument as a string. If there is no such argument an empty string is returned.

getLastOption

public static java.lang.String getLastOption(java.lang.String errormsg)
Method comment: Return the last argument as a string. If there is no such argument an errormsg will be printed and the program will exits with an System.exit()-call.
